verses.verse: And the Philistines<WH6430> took<WH3947> the ark<WH727> of God,<WH430> and brought<WH935> it from Ebenezer<WH72> to Ashdod.<WH795>
When the Philistines<WH6430> took<WH3947> the ark<WH727> of God,<WH430> they brought<WH935> it into the house<WH1004> of Dagon,<WH1712> and set<WH3322> it by Dagon.<WH1712>

And when they of Ashdod<WH795> arose<WH7925> early<WH7925> on the morrow,<WH4283> behold,<WH2009> Dagon<WH1712> was fallen<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the earth<WH776> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the LORD.<WH3068> And they took<WH3947> Dagon,<WH1712> and set<WH7725> him in his place<WH4725> again.<WH7725>

And when they arose<WH7925> early<WH7925> on the morrow<WH4283> morning,<WH1242> behold,<WH2009> Dagon<WH1712> was fallen<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the ground<WH776> before<WH6440> the ark of the LORD;<WH3068> and the head<WH7218> of Dagon<WH1712> and both<WH8147> the palms<WH3709> of his hands<WH3027> were cut<WH3772> off on the threshold;<WH4670> only<WH7535> the stump of Dagon<WH1712> was left<WH7604> to him.

Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> neither<WH3808> the priests<WH3548> of Dagon,<WH1712> nor any<WH3605> that come<WH935> into Dagon's<WH1712> house,<WH1004> tread<WH1869> on<WH5921> the threshold<WH4670> of Dagon<WH1712> in Ashdod<WH795> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

But the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was heavy<WH3513> on them of Ashdod,<WH795> and he destroyed<WH8074> them, and smote<WH5221> them with tumors,<WH6076> even<WH853> Ashdod<WH795> and the coasts<WH1366> thereof.

And when the men<WH582> of Ashdod<WH795> saw<WH7200> that it was so,<WH3651> they said,<WH559> The ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> shall not abide<WH3427> with us: for his hand<WH3027> is sore<WH7185> on us, and on Dagon<WH1712> our god.<WH430>

They sent<WH7971> therefore and gathered<WH622> all<WH3605> the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> to them, and said,<WH559> What<WH4100> shall we do<WH6213> with the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel?<WH3478> And they answered,<WH559> Let the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> be carried<WH5437> about<WH5437> to Gath.<WH1661> And they carried<WH5437> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> about<WH5437> thither.

And it was so, that, after<WH310> they had carried<WH5437> it about,<WH5437> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was against the city<WH5892> with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> destruction:<WH4103> and he smote<WH5221> the men<WH582> of the city,<WH5892> both small<WH6996> and great,<WH1419> and they had tumors<WH6076> in their secret<WH8368> parts.

Therefore they sent<WH7971> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> to Ekron.<WH6138> And it came<WH1961> to pass, as the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to Ekron,<WH6138> that the Ekronites<WH6139> cried<WH2199> out, saying,<WH559> They have brought<WH5437> about<WH5437> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> to us, to slay<WH4191> us and our people.<WH5971>

So they sent<WH7971> and gathered<WH622> together all<WH3605> the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and said,<WH559> Send<WH7971> away the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> and let it go<WH7725> again<WH7725> to his own place,<WH4725> that it slay<WH4191> us not, and our people:<WH5971> for there was a deadly<WH4194> destruction<WH4103> throughout all<WH3605> the city;<WH5892> the hand<WH3027> of God<WH430> was very<WH3966> heavy<WH3513> there.
And the men<WH582> that died<WH4191> not were smitten<WH5221> with the tumors:<WH6076> and the cry<WH7775> of the city<WH5892> went<WH5927> up to heaven.<WH8064>
